room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: This was our first escape room. We did the Atlantis challenge and it was a blast. We made it to the last room before time ran out. It was an awesome experience and we plan to return soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: This was our second attempt at an escape game. The Atlantis one is the most high tech I have ever seen! Well worth the price!

room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: We had lots of fun with the Legend of Atlantis! Great teamwork! The staff was friendly. And we loved the challenge.

room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: This was our first escape room and both me and my husband had a blast! We were paired with another group of 5. The Atlantis room was very challenging but not impossible. We were able to get out in the hour allotted to us. Definitely recommended for families, couples, and all ages.

room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: We went and did both rooms with Gatlin's Escape Games. This was our first ever escape room and we escaped from both! Atlantis was the hardest - we only made it out with 20 seconds to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Gatlin's Escape Games in Pigeon Forge
review: Atlantis was spectacular! One of the best escape rooms we have done.
